etena bhāvayec cakraṃ laghu si
ddhim avāpyate ||
prathamam bhāvayet kṛṣṇā dvitīyaṃ bhāvayed raktāṃ
tṛtīye bhāvayen pītāṃ caturtha haritavāṃ tathā |
ṣaḍ aṅga bhāvayed yogī viramāntaṃ punas tathā |
krama utpattikaṃ caiva krama utpannakam eva ca |
khadhātāv iti padmeṣu jñānaṃ bhagam iti smṛtaṃ |

bhāva
neti samāpattis tatsukhañ cakram ucyate ||

yathodayam bhavec chukraṃ dvaividhyaṃ saha
jan tataḥ |
yoṣit tāvad bhavet prajñā upāyaḥ puruṣaḥ smṛtaḥ |

puṃsi
tāva dvaividhyas tu śukran tasya sukhañ ca vā |
prajñāyām adhi yathā punsi śukran tasya mukhañ ca vā ||
ānandraṃ prathamaṃ vīraṃ paramānandan tu yoginī

suratānanda samastaṃ vai tanmu
khaupāya sarvvavit ||
ānandena tu mukhaṃ kiñcit paramānandan tato dhikaṃ |
viramānandair virāgaḥ syāt sahajānandan tu śeṣataḥ ||

paramānandaṃ bhavaṃ proktaṃ nirvvāṇañ ca
virāgataḥ ||
na rāgo na virāgaś ca madhyamā nopalabhyate |

nātra prajñā na co
pāyam samyaktatvāvabodhakaḥ ||
nānyena kathyate sahajaṃ kasminn api na labhyate |

hīnaṃ sūkṣmapadā
rthan tu utkṛṣṭaṃ bhāvam ucyate |
madhyamaṃ varjitaṃ dvābhyām anyānīti ṣaḍ indriyaṃ ||
samaṃ tulyam ity uktaṃ tasya cako rasaḥ smṛtaḥ
samasa tv ekabhāvan tu anenārthena bhaṇyate |

madbha
vā hi jagat sarvvaṃ madbhavaṃ bhuvanatrayaṃ |
mayā vyāptaṃm edaṃ sarvvan nānyamayaṃ dṛsyate jagat ||

evam matvā tu vai yogī yoge bhyaset su
samāhitaḥ |
sa sidhyati na saṃdeho mandapuṇyo pi mānavaḥ ||
khāne pāne tathā snāne jāgrataḥ supto pi vā cintyayet |

sā
tatyaṃ ca tato yādi mahāmudrābhikāṃkṣakaḥ ||
bhāvyante hi jagat sarvvaṃ manasā yasmān na bhāvyate |

teṣā
m ekaṃ paran nāsti svasaṃvedya mahan sukhaṃ ||
svasaṃvedyād bhavet siddhiḥ svasaṃvedyaṃ hi bhāvanā |
svayaṃ harttā svayaṃ karttā svayaṃ rājā svayaṃ prabhuḥ |
rāgaṃ dveṣyan tathairṣyā ca moham mānaṃ tathaiva ca |

sarve te tatpade ramye kalā nārghanti ṣo
ḍasīṃ |

śukrākā
ro bhaved bhagavān tatsukhaṃ kāminī smṛtaṃ ||
ekānekaviyogau sau kṣaṇād ekā parā ratiḥ |
pṛthvī āpa vāyus teja ākāśam eva ca
svargamatyaiś ca pātālair ekamūrtti bhavet kṣaṇāt |
siddhir nna syā bhavec chuddhyā punarjatmabhavāntare |

na ca
tena vinā siddhir iha lo paratra ca |
na jñātaṃ yena hevajraṃ vṛthā tasya parisramaḥ ||

div.p: yoginīcakro nāma melāpakapaṭalo 'ṣṭamaḥ || ||

athaḥ paraṃ
viśuddhipaṭalaṃ vyākhyāmaḥ ||
sarvveṣāṃ khalu vastūnām viśuddhis tathatā smṛtā |
paścād ekaikabhedena devatānān tu kathya
te |

lg.l: ṣaḍ indriyaṃ pañca skandhāḥ ṣaḍ āyatanaṃ pañca mahābhūtaṃ

rūpaviṣayādi
ye py anye pratibhāsante hi yoginaḥ |
sarve te svabhāvaśuddhā hi yasmād buddhamayaṃ jagat ||

div.p:
vajragarbha āha || he bhagavan ke te 'viśuddhyā || ||
|| bhagavān āha || rūpādayaḥ kasmād grāhyagrāhakabhāvāt || vajragarbha āha || ke te grāhyāḥ ke te grāhakāś ceti ||

bhagavān āha ||
cakṣuṣā gṛhyate rūpaṃ śabdaḥ karṇṇena śruyate |
gandhan nāsikayā vetti jihvayā svādanam viduḥ |

lg.l:
kāyena spṛsyate va
stu manaḥ sukhādim āpnute |

rūpaskandha bhaved vajrā gaurī vedanā smṛ
tā |

div.p:
vijñānaskandharūpeṇa sthitā nairātmaāyoginī |
adhyātmapu
ṭe
savā hy āsāṃ viśuddhyā vaiḥ sidhyante tatvayoginaḥ ||

bāhyapuṭe |
aiśānye pukkasī khātā | agnau sabarī tathaiva
ca |
naiṛtye sthāpya caṇḍālī | vāyavye ḍombinī sthitā ||

lg.l:
dvāre | indre gaurī yama caurī | vetālī vā
ruṇe diśi
kauveryāṃ ghasmīrī caiva adhare bhūcarī smṛtā |
rūpe gaurī sadākhyātā | sabde caurī prakīrttitā |

vetālī gandhabhā ca | rase ghasmīrī prakīrtti
tā |
sadā hy āsāṃ viśuddhyā tu sidhyante tatvayoginaḥ |

bhujānāṃ śu
nyatā śuddhiś caraṇau māraviśuddhitaḥ |

pṛthvī pukkasī khyātā āpdhā
tu śabarī smṛtā |
tejaś caṇḍālinī jñeyā vāyu ḍombī prakīrttitā |

ī
rṣyā vajraḍākī ca | paiśunyā guptagaurikā |
moha vajra tathākhyātā | dveṣādīnān tu sodhanaṃ |
yena tu yena tu badhyati lokas
tena tu tena tu bandhana muucyate |
tasmād gandha na śabda na rūpan

div.p: viśuddhipaṭalo navamaḥ || ||

lg.l:
śiṣyam abhiṣicyate yena vi
dhiṃ cāpi pravakṣyate |

u
dyāne vijane deśe bodhisattve gṛheṣu ca

divyena rajolekhena athavā ma
dhyamena tu ||
trihasta maṇḍalaṃ kāryyan tatrayāṅguṣṭhādhikaṃ ca tat ||

vidyās tatra pra
veṣṭavyā divyāḥ paṃcakulodbhavāḥ ||
athavā yān tāṃ yathālabdhāṃ ṣoḍaśābdikān tathaiva ca |
tāvat sevyate mudrā yāvat sukravatī bhavet ||
mudrāyās tu mukham bathā upāyasya mukhan tathā
sevayā tatra yad bhūtaṃ śiṣyavaktre niṣātayet |

kāritavyañ ca tatraiva sama
rasaṃ śiṣyagocaraṃ |
sa eva prāṇināṃ prāṇaḥ sa eva paramākṣaraḥ ||

sa evāsau jagatmayaḥ sarvvavyā
pī sa evāsau sarvvadehe vyavasthitaḥ ||

sarvvavijñānarūpañ ca puruṣaṃ purāṇam īśva
raṃ ||
ātma jīvaṃ ca satvañ ca kālaḥ pudgala eva ca |
tṛtīyo viramākhyaṃ tu caturthaṃ sahajaṃ sṛtaṃ ||
evaṃ śrutvā tu vai sarvve vajragarbhādayo budhāḥ |

viramānandaṃ jagac caiva na vidyet saha
jaṃ triṣv iti ||

na rāgo
na virāgaś ca madhyamā nopalabhyate |
trayāṇāṃ varjanād eva sahajaḥ sambodhir ucyate ||

athavā sarvātmaka syaiva athavā sa
rvvai vivarjitaḥ ||
bhagavān āha || viramānandau lakṣayet tac ca ānandatrayavarjita ||

prathamaṃ meghavad bhāti siddhe tu mā
yāvad bhavet |

ity āha maṇḍa
laṃ śāstā | catuḥkoṇaṃ samujvalāṃ |

pu
ṣpaṃ dīpaṃ tathā gandhaṃ aṣṭakalaśādibhir yutaṃ |

pañcaratnaparikṣi
ptā dadyād vijayañ ca | pūrvvataḥ |

baliṃ ca dāpayet tatra
prār ākārādimantrataḥ |
rakṣāṃ caiva yathoddiṣṭāṃ yathā dhyāne tathātra ca |

prakāśitās tu ye ṣekā vidhivad dadyāt sva
maṇḍale |
śuddhaṃ dvipuṭam vilikhyādau gauryyādīnāṃ likhyet tataḥ ||

pūrveṇa li
khyet kartti dakṣiṇe paścime tathā ||
uttare agnikoṇe ca naiṛtye vāyavye tathā |
aiśānye ca yathākathitam adhordve ca tathā |

paścā tatvaṃ samākhyāti viśuddhaṃ jñānarū
piṇaḥ |
paramaratau na ca bhāvya na bhāvaḥkaḥ |

na ca vigraha na ca grāhya na
grāhakaḥ |
mānsa na soṇita viṣṭa na sūtraṃ |
na ca ghṛṇa moha na saucapavitraṃ |
rāga na dveṣa na moha na īrṣyā |

na ca paiśū
nya na māna na dṛsyaṃ
bhāva na bhāvaka mitra na satruṃ

ity āha vajragarbhākhyaḥ || he bhagavan kasmād bhū
tātmakaṃ bhavet |

div.p: he bhagavan karmāt mahābhautikaḥ skandhaḥ ||

lg.l: tajo jāyate gharṣaṇād gamanād vāyuḥ prakīrttitā |

saukhyam ākāśadhātu
ś ca paṃcabhiḥ parivesthitaḥ |
tasmāt saukhyan na tatvākhyaṃ mahābhūtaṃ yataḥ sukhaṃ |

sahajābhyāṃ yad utpannaṃ sahajan tat niga
dyate ||
na mantrajāpo na tapo na homo
na māṇḍaleyaṃ na ca maṇdalañ ca |
sa mantrajāpaḥ sa tapaḥ sa homas

div.p: iti abhiṣekapaṭalo daśamaḥ || ||

lg.l:
samā krūrā lalaṭī ca pāta
nā kathitā sadā |
vaśyā vāmāsṛtā dṛṣṭiḥ puttalī dvau ca vāmataḥ |
ākṛṣṭi dakṣiṇe bhāge dvau ca urdve niyojayet |

madhyamā
stambhanā dṛṣṭi dvau ca nāsājaḍāntare |

pūrakena tu cākṛṣṭiḥ stambhanā śānti
na tu |
bhrāntir atra na karttavyā acintyā buddhaṛddhayaḥ |
māraṇan nātra kārya syāt mayaḥ bhedaḥ param bhavet |
sarvākāryyan tu karttavyaṃ hitvā satvasya vañcanaṃ ||
nādiṃ gādiṃ tathā hādim antasvām ādisvaṃ ca vā |

saptāvartta
to lakṣed dhevajroktais tu lakṣaṇaiḥ |

sa
ptacchāyā bhavet tasya dṛṣṭvā yogī tu lakṣayet ||

lakṣam ekena rājānaṃ prajā
lokāyutena tu |
lakṣatrayayeṇa devāś ca satam ekena mantriṇaḥ ||

div.p:
|| ||
vajragarbhābhisambodhir nāma prathamakalparājaḥ samāptaḥ || ||

bhagavān āha ||
homaṃ kṛtvā yathāproktaṃ varttayitvā tu maṇḍalaṃ ||
pradoṣe saṃskaret pratimāṃ
kṛtvādhivāsanādikaṃ |

lg.l: trikoṇe māraṇe proktaṃ śeṣān tatraiva sādhayet ||

ekahastārddhaha
stam vā adhordve śāntikam bhavet |
dvihastam ekahastañ ca adhordve pauṣṭikam mataṃ ||
viṃśatyaṅgulam arddham vā adhordve ca māraṇaṃ ||

śukla
varṇṇa bhavec chāntau pītaṃ pauṣṭike tathā |
māraṇe kṛṣṇavarṇṇaṃ ca vaśya raktan tathaiva ca ||

yathā vaśyeā tathākṛṣṭau dveṣādyā yathā
māraṇe ||
tilaṃ śāntau dadhi puṣṭau māraṇe kaṭakan tathā ||
dveṣādau karṇṇakaṃ proktaṃ vaśyākṛṣṭau ca utpalaṃ ||

div.p:
oṁ agneya mahā
tetāḥ sarvakāmārthasādhakaḥ
kāruṇyakṛtasatvārtham asmin sannihito bhava |
agnyāvāhanaṃ ||

lg.l: nānāratnavari dhātrī amuko haṃ maṇḍalaṃ likhe |

div.lg:
svārthaṃ caiva parārthañ ca sādhituṃ gaccha havyabhuk |
āgamiṣyasi yathākāle sarvasiddhiṃ kuruṣva me ||
agnisantoṣaṇamantraḥ ||

lg.l: oṁ jaḥ hūṁ vaṁ hoḥ khaṁ raṁ || arghamantraḥ |
oṁ ni rī hūṁ khaḥ | pādyamantraḥ |

div.p: || prathamapaṭala || ||

lg.l:
kṣaṇam apy anyacettaḥ
san na tiṣṭhet siddhikāṃkṣakaḥ ||

yatrasthaḥ siddhate mantrī ekacittaḥ sa
samāhitaḥ ||
svagṛheṣu niśākāle siddho ham iti cetasā |

aṅghrī
prakṣālayan bhuṃjann ācaman pūgaṃ bhakṣayan
candranair hastaṃ mardayan kaupīnai cchādayan kaṭīṃ ||

niḥsaran bhāṣayan bhā
ṣāṃ gacchan tiṣṭhan ruṣan haṣan |
bhagavatīn sevayan prājño yoginīṃ bhāvayed vratī ||
na sthātavyaṃ budhair yatnāt siddhyarthaṃ siddhikākṣibhiḥ ||
rāga dveṣa tathā mohaiḥ sādhako naiva kliṣyate ||

kathan te kṣaṇam apy a
yoginaḥ santi raurave ||
paṃcānantaryyakārī ca prāṇivadhe ratāś ca ye |

api tu ye jatmahīnā ye mūrkhāḥ krūrakarmmi
ṇaḥ ||
kurūpā vikalāgātrāś ca sidhyante te pi cintayā |
māsam ekañ care guptaṃ yāvat mudrāṃ na labhyate |

ādeśa labhyate ma
ntrī yoginīr ādisyate ||
gṛhītvā amukī mudrāṃ satvārthaṃ kuru vajradhṛk |
māsam ekena bhavyā sā bhaven naivātra saṃśayaḥ ||

athavā cātma
naḥ saktyā kṛṣṭvā mudrāṃ prakalpayet ||

tāñ ca guhya carec caryā ātmano
dhairyyapratyayāt ||
na caryyā bhogataḥ proktā yā khātā bhīmarūpiṇī |
svacittaṃ pratyavekhyāyai sthiraṃ kiṃ vā calaṃ matmamanaḥ ||
mudrayā mudrayā dvābhyāṃ mudrāsiddhi katham bhavet ||

strīrūpaṃ pa vihā
yānyad rūpaṃ kuryyād bhagavataḥ |

tīraṃ dvayaṃ bhaved ghaṇṭhā kiṃjalkam bolako
bhavet |

mudrāsiddhir bha
ved yatsād vyaktasaktasya yoginaḥ ||

upāyaḥ sambhavo yasmāl layaḥ prajñā
bhavāntakī ||
tena pralayat nāsyāsty utpādo naiva tatvataḥ |
pralayāl līyate kaścil layābhāvāt na ca kṣayaṃ ||
yathā māyā yathā svapnaṃ yathā syād antarābhavaḥ |

su
khaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ sukhaṃ pītaṃ sukhaṃ raktaṃ sukhaṃ sitaṃ
sukhaṃ śyāmaṃ sukhaṃ kṛtsnaṃ sukhaṃ sacarācaraṃ |

sukhaṃ ca prajñā sukhopāyaḥ sukhaṃ kunduru
jan tathā |

utpannakramayogo yaṃ satsukhaṃ mahāsukha ma
taṃ |
aho śraddhāvegena naṣṭo sau mahābodhisatva iti |
dehābhāve kutaḥ saukhyaṃ saukhyaṃ vaktun na śakyate ||

yathā puṣpāśritaṃ gandhaṃ
puṣpābhāvān na gamyate |
bhāvo han naiva bhāvo haṃ buddho haṃ vastubodhanāt |

māṃ na jānanti ye
mūḍhāḥ kauśīdyopahatāś ca ye |

vyākhyātāhaṃ
m ahā dharmma śrotāhaṃ svagaṇair yyutaḥ ||
sādhyo haṃ jagataḥ śāstā loko haṃ laukiko py ahaṃ ||
tathā ca pratyayaṃ putra andhakāre pradīpavat ||
vināṃ tena na saukhya syāt sukhaṃ hitvā bhavet na saḥ |
tasmād buddho na bhāvaḥ syād abhāvarūpo pi naiva saḥ ||
tasmāt sahajaṃ jagat sarvvam sahajaṃ svarūpam ucyate ||

tenaiva viṣatatvajño vi
ṣeṇa sphoṭayed viṣaṃ ||

bhava śuddho bha
venaiva vikalpaṃ pratikalpataḥ |
karṇṇe toyaṃ yathā viṣṭaṃ pratitoyena kṛṣyate |

tathā bhavavikalpo ṣi ākāraiḥ śodhyate kha
lu ||
yathā yāvadagdhāś ca svidyaṃte vahninā punaḥ |

yena yena hi badhyante
jantavo raudrakarmaṇā |

viparī
tabhāvanā hy eṣā na jñātā buddhatīrthakaiḥ ||
eka eva mahānandaḥ paṃcatāṃ yāti bhedanaiḥ ||

bodhicittaṃ dravaṃ yasmād dravam abdhā
tukaṃ mataṃ |

rāgo amitavajraḥ
syād rāgas tejasi sambhavaḥ ||
kakkolake tu yac cittan tat samīraṇasvarūpakaṃ |

īrṣyā amoghasiddhiḥ syād amogho vāyusa
mbhavaḥ ||
sukhaṃ rāgam bhaved raktaṃ rakṣir ākāsalakṣaṇā |

e
kam eva mahac cittaṃ paṃcarūpeṇa lakṣitaṃ |

tasmād ekasvabhāvo sau mahāsukha para
maśāsvataḥ |

div.p:
|| hevajraḍākinījālasambhavare siddhinirṇṇanayo nāmā dvi
tīyaḥ paṭalaḥ || ||

lg.l: atha vajrī sarvvatantranidānan nāmopāyaṃ yoginīnāṃ kathayām āsa ||

samvaraṃ cābhiṣekaṃ ca
sandhyābhāṣan tathaiva ca |
abhiṣekāj jñāyate samyak evaṃkāraṃ mahat sukhaṃ ||
atha bhagavantaṃ vajrasatvaṃ yoginyaḥ evam āhuḥ |
evaṃkāraṃ kim ucyeta ḍākinīnāṃ tu samvaraṃ ||

ekārākṛti yad di
vyaṃ madhye vaṁkārabhūṣitaṃ |
vicitraṃ ca vipākañ ca vimarddo vilakṣaṇas tathā |

vimarddam ālocanaṃ proktaṃ su
khaṃ bhuktaṃ mayeti ca |

vira
mānando vimardde ca sahajānando vilakṣaṇe ||
ācāryya guhya prajñā ca caturtha tat punas tathā |
hasitaśuddhyā tv ācāryya īkṣaṇe guhyakas tathā |
prajñā pāṇyāvāptau ca tat punar dvandvatantrake ||
ṣekaṃ ca caturvvidhaṃ khyātaṃ satvānāṃ siddhihetave |

pāṇibhyāṃ tu samāliṅga
prajñāṃ vai śoḍaśābdikāṃ |

jñātvā śiṣyaṃ mahadbhūtaṃ nirīrṣyaṃ krodhava
jritaṃ |
śāstā tam ājñāpayati kunduruṃ kuru vajradhṛt ||

mudrāyu
ktaṃ gurun dṛṣṭvā stutipūjāṃ kared yathā ||
yathā yūyaṃ mahātmāno samādhi kuru tad vibho ||

tṛṣṭānnapānaṃ khādyañ ca madanaṃm ba
laṃ mahattaraṃ ||
śāstā brūyāt mahāsatva dhāraṇīyaṃ mahat sukhaṃ ||

yāvad ābodhiparyya
ntaṃ satvārthaṅ kuru vajradhṛk |
ity evam vadate vajrī siṣyam vīkṣya kriyācayaṃ ||
sthiracalaṃ vyāpya santiṣṭhen māyārūpīva bhāti ca |

p.l: atha sarvvayoginīnāṃ bhaginīnāṃ mṛṣitvā vajragarbho bhagavantam evam āha ||

maṇḍalacakraṃ kim ucyeta sa
rvvabuddhātmakaṃ puraṃ ||

lg.l: maṇḍalaṃ māram ity uktaṃ bodhicittaṃ mahat sukhaṃ |
ādānan taṃ karotīti maṇḍalam mīlanam mataṃ ||
prāṇinaś ca tvayā ghātyā vaktavyañ ca mṛṣāvacaḥ |
adattañ ca tvayā grāhyaṃ sevanaṃ parayoṣitāṃ ||

ekacittaṃ prā
ṇivadhaṃ prāṇaṃ cittaṃ yato mataṃ |

yoṣicchukrem adattaṃ ca para
dārā svābhamundarī || || ||

ke punas te viṣayāḥ kānīndriyāni kim āyata
nan katamāḥ skandhāḥ ke punas te dhātavaḥ eṣāṃ kaḥ svabhāvaḥ ||

rūpaṃ śabda tathā gandho rasa paṣṭavya
eva ca |
dharmmadhātusvabhāvaś ca ṣaḍ ete viṣayā matā ||
cakṣuḥ śrotrañ ca ghrāṇaṃ ca jihvā kāyo manas tathā |
indriyaṃ viṣayaṃ caiva indriyaṃ jñānam eva ca |
svabhāvanaivādyanutpannan na satyaṃ na mṛṣās tathā ||

div.p:
tad ya
thā kāṇḍaṃ ca mathanīyañ ca puruṣahastavyāyāmañ ca pratītyākasmād agnir upajāyate | asāv agni na kāṇḍe tiṣṭhati na mathanīye

kuruta ||
